titles.title: A bill to designate the Department of Veterans Affairs Medical Center in Spokane, Washington, as the "Mann-Grandstaff Department of Veterans Affairs Medical Center".

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6511-6512)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

committee.name: Committee on Veterans' Affairs. (text of measure as introduced: CR S6512)

action.text: Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Hearings held.

bill.summary: 10/13/2011--Introduced. Designates the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) medical center in Spokane, Washington, as the "Mann-Grandstaff Department of Veterans Affairs Medical Center."
